title: Bid deadline for Sinnar Power extended by one month
description: The Sinnar Power plant's bidding deadline has been extended to September 20, allowing more time for due diligence. Key concerns include a lack of coal linkage and railway connectivity. Major power producers, including Adani Power and JSW Energy, have expressed interest in the plant located near Nashik, Maharashtra.
